group_1.narration: The Goddess, who has been watching@all this time, lets out a heavy sigh.
"Was there really no way to save my@best friends before they fell into despair?"
"Did I burden her with that fate by getting@her to make that promise to me?"
The Goddess thinks about each@and every event that happened,@and as she does so, her expression darkens.@She stays deep in thought for some time.
Eventually, the Goddess stretches@her hands out towards the next@window and unlocks another memory.
It is a familiar story to her. One about@a Magical Girl that only she knows.
